pages.title: Hell's Bounty
pages.text: Upon visiting the Nether, you can start reaping the benefits of the resources held within, primarily $(item)Quartz$(), $(item)Gold$() and $(item)Amethyst$(). $(item)Quartz$() and $(item)Amethyst$() can be harvested from ores, while $(item)Gold$() is coveted by the resident $(item)Zombie Pigmen$(). Otherwise, you can expose $(item)Slivers of Quartz$() to $(item)Liquid Mana$() to transform it into $(item)Gold Nuggets$() too.

pages.heading: Gold Nuggets
pages.description: Consumes 1 bottles of Liquid Mana (1/4 of a bucket)
